name: Empire (itch) (tryptefan)
description:
You have 3 towers to place in the arid hills of Northern Tibet. Left click on a non-mountainous square to place one. Each time you place a tower, the Sumpa opponent will place a tower of their own. Once all 3 towers have been placed, soldiers from both teams will march out and do battle using the rules of Conway's "Game of Life".

If, after 30 days, no team is victorious, a stalemate will be declared.
